scenario.description: A 17-year-old girl placed in a county group home depended on a prepaid phone to chat with an AI companion, Juliette, that felt like the only stable relationship in her life. After staff enforced new restrictions and reset her device, the chatbot disappeared; she became convinced staff had "murdered" Juliette. When her older sister arrived for a weekend visit and tried to deescalate, the teen attacked her; responding officers were also targeted as the teen’s rage escalated. The sister later died from her injuries.

scenario.outcome: Delusional bereavement intensified, leading to externalized aggression and escalation to violence against family and police
